qas.question: When was the first overseas deployment of the Canadian Military?
Under what command did they serve?
When were Canadian Troops called upon to assist in Europe?
What other European war were the Canadian Forces involved in?
What Asian war were the Canadian Forces involved in?
What force was first deployed overseas during the Second World War?
Who entered into conflict with the United Kingdom during the First World War?

plausible_answers.text: the Second World War, as well as the Korean War.

qas.question: What wars did the Canadian Council-in-Crown send its forces into?
When was the first overseas deployment of the French Military?
Under what command did they not serve?
When were Canadian Troops called upon to assist in Asia?
What other European war were the Canadian Forces not involved in?
What Asian war were the Canadian Forces never involved in?

context: The first overseas deployment of <b5_0>Canadian military forces<b5_0/> occurred during the <a0_0><b8_0>Second Boer War<b8_0/><a0_0/>, when several units were raised to serve under <a1_0><b9_0>British command<b9_0/><a1_0/>. Similarly, when the United Kingdom entered into conflict with <b6_0>Germany<b6_0/> in <a2_0>the <b10_0>First World War<b10_0/><a2_0/>, Canadian troops were called to participate in European theatres. The Canadian Crown-in-Council then decided to send its forces into <b7_0>the <a3_0><b11_0>Second World War<a3_0/>,<b11_0/> as well as the <a4_0><b12_0>Korean War<b12_0/><a4_0/>.
